author: Al Jazeera
title: A timeline of the Trump administration's coronavirus actions
description: Travel restrictions, lack of tests, contradicting claims: These are some of the major actions by President
content:
The administration of US President Donald Trump has faced its greatest challenge in 2020: The coronavirus pandemic and the disease it causes, COVID-19. 
Since emerging in China at the end of 2019, the virus has spread all over the world. The US now leads the… [+12773 chars]
